storyTitle: As Manager, I want to view employee schedules to achieve better oversight.

testCases.title: Validate successful viewing of employee schedules
preconditions: User is logged in with Manager role credentials
Manager has appropriate permissions to view employee schedules
EmployeeSchedules table contains schedule data for the test period
At least one shift is marked as unfilled in the system

steps.action: Navigate to the employee schedule view from the main dashboard or menu
steps.expectedResult: Schedule interface is displayed with calendar format showing current date range, navigation controls, and filter options are visible

steps.action: Select a date range using the date picker (e.g., select start date and end date for a 7-day period)
steps.expectedResult: Schedule for the selected period is displayed showing all employee shifts, shift times, employee names, and shift types in calendar format within 2 seconds

steps.action: Review the displayed schedule and identify unfilled shifts by looking for visual indicators
steps.expectedResult: Unfilled shifts are clearly highlighted with distinct visual markers (e.g., different color, border, or icon) making them easily distinguishable from filled shifts

postconditions: Manager remains on the employee schedule view
Schedule data is displayed accurately reflecting the current state of the EmployeeSchedules table
No data has been modified in the system

testCases.title: Verify filtering of schedules by employee
preconditions: User is logged in with Manager role credentials
Manager has appropriate permissions to view employee schedules
EmployeeSchedules table contains schedule data for multiple employees
At least one employee has multiple shifts assigned in the current period
Employee filter dropdown is populated with active employees

steps.action: Navigate to the employee schedule view from the main dashboard or menu
steps.expectedResult: Schedule interface is displayed with calendar format, showing all employees' shifts, and filter options including employee filter dropdown are visible

steps.action: Click on the employee filter dropdown and select a specific employee from the list
steps.expectedResult: Schedule is filtered and refreshed to show only the selected employee's shifts, with the employee's name displayed in the filter indicator, and response time is under 2 seconds

steps.action: Review all displayed shifts in the calendar view and verify each shift belongs to the selected employee
steps.expectedResult: Only the selected employee's shifts are visible in the calendar, showing their shift times, dates, and shift types, with no shifts from other employees displayed

postconditions: Manager remains on the employee schedule view
Employee filter remains active showing the selected employee
Schedule displays only the filtered employee's data
Filter can be cleared or changed to view other employees
No data has been modified in the system
